title: Kensa Splat Dualies
paragraphs: The Kensa Splat Dualies are a main weapon in Splatoon 2. They are a Toni Kensa-branded variant of the Splat Dualies.

The Kensa Splat Dualies are black-and-white Splat Dualies with a Toni Kensa signature red clothespin attached to the back of each pistol. Unlike the Splat Dualies and the Enperry Splat Dualies, the ink reservoirs of the Kensa Splat Dualies do not change with the user's ink color and are always black.
The Kensa Splat Dualies were released on 14 September 2018 at 02:00 UTC. It comes with Suction Bombs and the Baller.
- An Octoling boy with Kensa Splat Dualies.
- An Inkling girl with the Kensa Splat Dualies

- In the version 4.0.0 trailer, an Octoling holding this weapon is shown without shoes. The reason for this is likely because the Toni Kensa brand only has three different shoes, and all three were already taken.
